section.p: A Medical Equipment section SHALL contain two templateIds. CCD templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.7 SHALL be present and the section SHALL conform to all the constraints specified in CCD for that template. An additional templateId SHALL be present where the value of @root is 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.9.1, indicating conformance to the constraints specified in this DSTU.

ol.li: SHALL conform to CCD Medical Equipment Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.7)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entry, such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Device Definition Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.9.4)
SHALL conform to CCD Medical Equipment Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.7)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="46264-8" History of medical device use (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-372, CONF-373)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supply Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.34)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.24)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entry, such that
Contains @typeCode="DRIV" DRIV (is derived from)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Device Definition Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.9.4)

SHOULD satisfy: Contains a a case-insensitive language-insensitive text string containing 'equipment' (CONF-375)
UNIMPLEMENTABLE
